narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sunrise Community of Tennessee Inc. is a Day Training  Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Knoxville, TN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $9.4M in Medicaid payments across 37K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $9.4M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
